code: @Override public byte get(int index) {     return bytes[offset + index]. }

@Override public BytesReference slice(int from, int length) {     if (from < 0 || (from + length) > this.length) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("can't slice a buffer with length [" + this.length + "], with slice parameters from [" + from + "], length [" + length + "]").     }     return new BytesArray(bytes, offset + from, length). }
@Override public BytesRef toBytesRef() {     return new BytesRef(bytes, offset, length). }
